LanguageData.MessagePlacementItemSurface: Must be placed on an item surface!
LanguageData.MessagePlacementMustBeUnderRoof: Must be placed under a roof!
LanguageData.MessagePlacementAgainstSupport: Must place against a supporting structure!
LanguageData.MessagePlacementNotOn: You can not place that on
LanguageData.MessagePlacementNotHere: You can not place that here!
